item.title: HILLS BANCORPORATION 10-K
item.description: HILLS BANCORPORATION, which is in the State Commercial Banks [6022] industry, SEC 10-K filing on March 04, 2022 had 38842 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: loans - 553 instances company - 451 instances 2021 - 437 instances financial - 434 instances 1 - 413 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
